name: BEEP BOOP I'm GiGi (hello)
description:
Beep Boop I’m Gigi Hello is a 2.5D platformer where you play as Gigi, a confused little robot who needs repairing

Warning: you will (intentionally) experience inverted controls for part of this game, Gigi is just a good boy trying his best

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/robot-game-2

A Global Game Jam 2020 entry by @alexpritc @solomnc @josiegamedev @hungrydevstudios and Turnip the cat.
